title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: June 05, 2023, 07:10:44 PMLast edit: June 05, 2023, 07:23:34 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 289Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 1 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-289-nunes-vs-pena-3/matchesMatches(2 points each)11. Amanda Nunes vs. Irene Aldana 10. Charles Oliveira vs. Beneil Dariush9. Mike Malott vs. Adam Fugitt8. Dan Ige vs. Nate Landwehr7. Eryk Anders vs. Marc-Andre Barriault(1 point each)6. Nassourdine Imavov vs. Chris Curtis5. Miranda Maverick vs. Jasmine Jasudavicius4. Aiemann Zahabi vs. Aoriqileng3. Kyle Nelson vs. Blake Bilder2. David Dvorak vs. Stephen Erceg1. Diana Belbita vs. Maria OliveiraNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example11. Amanda Nunes 10. Beneil Dariush  9. Mike Malott 8. Dan Ige 7. Marc-Andre Barriault6. Nassourdine Imavov5. Miranda Maverick 4. Aoriqileng3. Blake Bilder 2. David Dvorak 1. Maria OliveiraNOT go the Full Distance 5(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.   Thank you for your cooperation.
